title: League of Legends Icon Multiplying in Dock
body:
Starting about a week ago the LoL icons would not leave the dock of my mac. 

Before each match you could normally see a second icon open on the dock, then close after you exited the match.

 It no longer closes and instead says, "application not responding".

The game is still playable, but the icons begin to fill up the dock infinitely.

It would be greatly appreciated if anyone could help me fix the issue at hand.

Thanks!

P.S. I haven't pinned the LoL launcher to the dock, so that bug shouldn't be affecting it.

replies.body: I have the same issue and it just began this week. I also don't have LoL Launcher pinned to the dock.

That's a strange issue, and we'd like to take a look at this!  Hit us up in a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can review the issue.  Any additional information like screenshots can help for context.  We'll respond asap!
